channel.title: Comments on: Show and Tell Thursday – Using gmail as a spam filter

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Well I did have a read through the T&Cs and nothing leapt out at me as being an issue. If they were worried about it they wouldn't let you forward your mail to another account.</p>
item.content:encoded: Well I did have a read through the T&Cs and nothing leapt out at me as being an issue. If they were worried about it they wouldn’t let you forward your mail to another account.

item.title: By: Vince Schuurman
item.dc:creator: Vince Schuurman
item.description: <p>Very nice, I wonder if they will not block that sooner or later <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$FILE/undecided.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded: Very nice, I wonder if they will not block that sooner or later http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$FILE/undecided.gif“>
